body_html:
I am wondering after tf.boolean_mask, how to recover the predicted results as a 2D tensor from pred (1D tensor) and mask (2D array with elements of 'True' or 'False'), where False corresponds to 0, True corresponds to the value in pred

mask = labels > 0
labels = tf.boolean_mask(labels, mask)
heatmaps = tf.boolean_mask(heatmaps, mask)

scores = tf.nn.softmax(logits=heatmaps, labels=labels)
pred = tf.argmax(scores)

@langmore

Thanks!
body_text:
I am wondering after tf.boolean_mask, how to recover the predicted results as a 2D tensor from pred (1D tensor) and mask (2D array with elements of 'True' or 'False'), where False corresponds to 0, True corresponds to the value in pred
mask = labels > 0
labels = tf.boolean_mask(labels, mask)
heatmaps = tf.boolean_mask(heatmaps, mask)

scores = tf.nn.softmax(logits=heatmaps, labels=labels)
pred = tf.argmax(scores)

@langmore
Thanks!
body:
I am wondering after `tf.boolean_mask`, how to recover the predicted results as a 2D tensor from `pred` (1D tensor) and `mask` (2D array with elements of 'True' or 'False'), where False corresponds to 0, True corresponds to the value in `pred`

```
mask = labels > 0
labels = tf.boolean_mask(labels, mask)
heatmaps = tf.boolean_mask(heatmaps, mask)

scores = tf.nn.softmax(logits=heatmaps, labels=labels)
pred = tf.argmax(scores)
```

@langmore 

Thanks!
